bug.author: azhavoro
bug.summary: Username validator on register view has wrong description
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
Wrong username validator message. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
validator message corresponds to the validator condition. <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Username validator message says Username must have at least 8 characters but 'test1' passes check. <denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
Align message and validator. <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://cvat.org/auth/register>https://cvat.org/auth/register</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
NA <denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
NA <denchmark-h:h3>Next steps</denchmark-h>
You may <denchmark-link:https://gitter.im/opencv-cvat/public>join our Gitter</denchmark-link> channel for community support.
